errors.error_description: The example command '$ rstcheck bad_syntax.rst' refers to a file that does not match the file content ('bad_rst.rst') shown in the preceding code block.
correction_candidates: Change the command to '$ rstcheck bad_rst.rst' to match the file content shown.
Change the file content to be named 'bad_syntax.rst'.
Add a note explaining that 'bad_syntax.rst' is a placeholder name.
Remove the example entirely as it is confusing.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to '$ rstcheck bad_rst.rst' to match the file content shown.
